sequence:
Lunar New Year Celebration

<size=45>Chapter 6 - New Year's Banquet?</size>

scripts.say: Phew... All right, the New Year Soba is coming out nicely...
It smells really good...
Ah, watch out, Yuudachi! Don't fall into the pot!
This one seems yummy too! Gimme seconds!
Calm down, there's more than enough left.
Souryuu, you really are quite talented~ Oh my, is Kaga here too?
Being able to enjoy a moment of peace every now and then isn't so bad.
That's not something I hear from you every day, Kaga. Oh, by the way, where's Akagi?
She spouted something like "I need to pamper Commander, who is always so hard working," and then ran off again.
Oh my... Looks like Commander will have no shortage of troubles this New Year as well...
I suppose this is "the weight of love." Well, since it's the New Year, we might as well let Akagi cut loose a bit.
Speaking of "cutting loose," I think these two have gone a bit overboard.
Oh, sakura's liquor... is truly ambrosia... *hic*
Laffey... wants another glass too...
I'll turn a blind eye on Eugen... But why is that girl from the Eagle Union here?
I ran into her at the store, nya. She seemed quite interested in our New Year's customs, so I brought her along, nya.
Ah, what a waste. She's wearing such a cute outfit... but give her some drinks and she turns into a puddle of mush.
A New Year's drinking party, huh? Haha... I haven't gotten fired up in a while.
Oh my, I can already see what happens next...
Li... quor? Is that edible...?
That would be the name of a miserable end for adults who have cast away too much. It's not something a good kid like you needs to know about, nya.
